thread.title: George Clooney: I feel like an idiot talking to my wife
thread.title_full: George Clooney: I feel like an idiot talking to my wife - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: George Clooney: I feel like an idiot talking to my wife
text:
Hollywood superstar George Clooney has joked that he feels like an idiot talking to his barrister wife Amal Alamuddin.
READ: George Clooney's mansion re-fit 'irritates' neighbours
Amal, 37, who holds degrees from Oxford and NYU's law school, challenges her famous husband in all things, reported Us magazine.
"I'm an idiot," Clooney joked of being cast for the role as Everett in 2000's "O Brother, Where Art Thou?".
"Oftentimes, I feel like an idiot talking to my own wife," he added with a laugh. "It's never good!"
The 59-year-old actor recently celebrated his first-year wedding anniversary.
"We (went to) Jerry Weintraub's memorial," Clooney said of the star-studded event honoring the legendary Ocean's Eleven producer, who passed away this past July.
Then, Clooney and Alamuddin celebrated their one year together.
"It was great. We had dinner... That was fun."
 George Clooney denies dyetting plastic surgery done - TOI
Gravity - Special Edition Amazon.in : INR 1,619.00
